Package org.dapper.codelet

A package for Dapper codelets.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Codelet
    Defines a basic unit of work in Dapper.
    DataService
    Defines a service for retrieving data.
    Identified
    Defines something with an identifier.
    Locatable
    Defines something that can be located over a network.
    Nameable
    Defines something with a name.
    ParameterMetadata
    Defines something that holds parameter metadata.
    Resource
    Defines a Codelet resource descriptor.
    Taggable<T>
    Defines something that can be tagged.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractHandleResource<T extends AbstractHandleResource<T>>
    A partial implementation of Resources as handles.
    CodeletUtilities
    A static utility class for Codelet execution.
    InputHandleResource
    A subclass of AbstractHandleResource for input handles.
    OutputHandleResource
    A subclass of AbstractHandleResource for output handles.
    StreamResource<T extends Closeable>
    An implementation of Resources as TCP streams.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Resource.ResourceType
    An enumeration of Resource types.

Package org.dapper.codelet Description

A package for Dapper codelets.
